description: Ukraine's cyber police have arrested a 28-year-old man who operated a massive virtual private network (VPN) service, allowing people from within the country to access the Russian internet (Runet). [...]
title: Ukraine arrests rogue VPN operator providing access to Runet

description: Ransomware gangs now exploit a critical security vulnerability that lets attackers gain remote code execution (RCE) on vulnerable Veeam Backup & Replication (VBR) servers. [...]
title: Akira and Fog ransomware now exploit critical Veeam RCE flaw

description: Fidelity Investments, a Boston-based multinational financial services company, disclosed that the personal information of over 77,000 customers was exposed after its systems were breached in August. [...]
title: Fidelity Investments says data breach affects over 77,000 people

description: The Underground ransomware gang has claimed responsibility for an October 5 attack on Japanese tech giant Casio, which caused system disruptions and impacted some of the firm's services. [...]
title: Underground ransomware claims attack on Casio, leaks stolen data

description: GitLab has released security updates to address multiple flaws in Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE), including a critical arbitrary branch pipeline execution flaw. [...]
title: GitLab warns of critical arbitrary branch pipeline execution flaw
